The company announced a bold new direction yesterday by partnering with Microsoft on its mobile strategy to compete with Apple and Google. The problem is it will take years for investors to see results. This partnership won't bear fruit until 2013 and beyond, said Alkesh Shah, an analyst with Evercore Partners. "Mainly, I trust my instincts because I have very broad tastes. I genuinely believe that if I like something, other people are going to like it as well. "American Idol' season 10 premiere ratings tank The big question when judge Simon Cowell announced he would not be returning to American Idol for season 10 was, What will the dynamic be like at the judges' table without him? Apparently many regular viewers didn"t really care about the answer.
